I recommend watching La La Land (2016) directed by Damien Chazelle. It is a musical comedy-drama film that won several awards including four Golden Globes.

The movie tells the story of two people, Andrew and Emma, who meet in Los Angeles while pursuing their dreams.

The music of the movie is stunningly beautiful and catchy. The dance choreography is also impressive.

Overall, La La Land (2016) directed by Damien Chazelle is a must-watch musical comedy-drama film.
